#summary Sample Application: Speeded-Up Robust Features Detector
#labels Type-SampleApps

The SURF sample application shows how to use the [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_Imaging_SpeededUpRobustFeaturesDetector.htm Speeded-Up Robust Features (SURF) Detector].
